column3: Latest;Siem Reap: CNE has learned that Micheal Woodall has died in Siem reap Hospital.------An Australian man is currently in a serious condition in a Siem Reap hospital.------Michael Woodall
column5: is said to be very sick.------An appeal has gone out for family and friends to get in contact to find out more information.------Contact: ------Facebook ------or ------email
